name: Anger Management (groober)
description:
INFO

Small game about destroying all you can as fast as possible!

Run around and relieve your stress with your trusty rocket launcher!!

Pick up power ups for maximum destruction power!!!

Short game made in 22hours for the YRHACKS 2023 Hackathon.

Unity 3d URP 2021.3.16f1

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

Mouse 1 - Fire

may or may not continue development on this game

That's all!

oh yeah and

github repo! :)
